description.value:
You run and climb across ropes and rigging almost as easily as on the ground. You gain a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Climb]{Climb} Speed of 15 feet, but only on ship's rigging or similar ropes.

Whenever you succeed at an Athletics check to Climb a rope or an Acrobatics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Balance]{Balance} on a rope, you get a critical success instead. You aren't @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} while Climbing or Balancing on a rope.
